Date: {{frappe.format_date(doc.date_of_joining,"dd MMM, yyyy")}}

Non-Disclosure Agreement

This agreement is made at Ahmedabad on {{frappe.format_date(doc.date_of_joining,"dd MMM, yyyy")}} between {{doc.company}}, having registered office at  7th Floor, Shaligram Corporates, C. J. Road, Iscon-Ambli Road, Ahmedabad, Gujarat - 380058.

And

Mr. /Ms. {{doc.employee_name}}, S/o / D/o / W/o  {% if doc.middle_name %}Mr. {{doc.middle_name}}{%endif%} (hereinafter) called the “Employee”.

Whereas, with the aim to ensure the protection of information, and to preserve any confidentiality necessary under patent and/or trade secret laws, which is effective from your date of Joining {{frappe.format_date(doc.date_of_joining, "dd MMM, yyyy")}} & it is agreed that:

  1. Employee will work for {{doc.company}} with full dedication, honesty, obedience & responsibility. Employee will be accountable to maintain the confidentiality during his employment for remuneration. Employee will follow all the rules & regulations of the {{doc.company}} & will avoid any misconduct, negligence related to behavior & work. Noncompliance of this clause may result in termination of his/her employment.
  2. Employee will be accountable to maintain the confidentiality of data, policies, procedures, computer source codes, projects, electronic files, machinery parts, invention disclosures, patent applications, technical and scientific information, research data, draft publications, technical reports, research plans, business plans, financial reports, projections, customer’s detail, training material and other company provided artifacts and so forth, during his employment & even after 3 years of his/her employment to any third party or on public forums or social networking sites.
  3. Employee will not accept any employment with or solicit any business or work from any organization, which has been either a customer/client or similar industry product dealing of the {{doc.company}}. Also, Employee will not join as an Employee/consultant in any organization that is working with the similar product/project for which Employee have worked during his/her employment with the {{doc.company}}, employee will not do business like manufacturing, trading, servicing for same or similar products which Employee have worked during his/her employment with the {{doc.company}} for a period of 36 months from the date of his/her reliving. In the event of a breach of this clause, the Company will be entitled to remedies of injunction, specific performance and other equitable relief, and no proof of special damages shall be necessary, and for the enforcement of these, the expenses shall be borne by Employee.
  4. During employment with the Company, Employee will devote his/her time and attention exclusively to the duties entrusted to him/her, known to him/her and will not engage directly or indirectly, part time or full time or allow himself/herself to be engaged to work for any person, firm or Company in the capacity whatsoever, nor do any business without obtaining prior permission of the Director(s) of the Company in writing.

WHEREFORE, the Employee acknowledges that they have read and understood this agreement and voluntarily accept the duties and obligations set forth herein.


Thanks & Regards,

For, {{doc.company}} {{ doc.employee_name }}
